Name: Base Station License, Approval, New American Class Car Service, Bronx
Title: A Local Law in relation to the approval of a determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by New American Class Car Service Corp., also known as New American Class Car Service for the renewal of a license to operate a base station in the borough of Queens.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

      Section one.  The determination by the Taxi and Limousine Commission to approve an application by New American Class Car Service Corp., also known as New American Class Car Serv. for the renewal of a license to operate a base station at 49-11A 43rd Avenue in the borough of Queens is hereby approved. 
      ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately. 

LS#2677
